title: Tal Henry and His North Carolinians

sources.title: Tal Henry and His North Carolinians

metadata.Plot: Tal Henry and His North Carolinians is a small band led by front man and violinist Tal Henry who often uses his bow to conduct and who acts as emcee to introduce the songs they perform. Their first number, "Come On, Baby!", is an upbeat honky-tonk styled piece, featuring clarinet and trumpet solos. They move to a romantic ballad, "Shame on You", as their next number, which also features soloists, most notably a lead vocalist. They end their three song set with "Milenberg Joys", another upbeat number featuring two of the band members performing a vocal scat duet, one of whom ends up being his own one man band.
metadata.Actors: Tal Henry and His North Carolinians
